Text: Thanks. Real Time is the best political show on TV. One of the few shows in which afterwards I don't feel like I've wasted my time by watching it.

thanks. you make my sauturdays the best, i wake up late, make coffee and there you are VTV, uploaded my favorite show. except when you fuck up and don't upload it untill late at saturday midnight you fuck.

Thanks for the upload work WHENEVER you can get around to it.

Hey AVIGUY -  you asked for feedback.  I REELY appreciate your Maher uploads in AVI format.  Mp4 sux mightily IMO.  I haven't found a player yet that works well with MP4.  It's especially bad with screen refreshes.  I hope you'll keep up the AVI.  I come here looking for yours every week.   Please keep up the good work.  CHEERS!
